channel.title: Destarrest [pi]
channel.description:
Destarrest [u][b]Sagi-evolutionx Based pictures[/b][/u]
Hello Everyone My ingame name is [u][b]dest[/b][/u] and I would like to announce about a new server named [u][b]Destarrest[/b][/u] We are Aiming to be the number #1 Runescape private server, for this to happen I need your help to make this rsps.We are currently at need of the following: [u][b]Webclient maker Website designer Client coders Server coders Beta testers Gfx designers[/b][/u] I am hoping to release beta in a week after I get my team organized, and hoping to release the full server earlier then December 25th.The reason I want to release it before christmas is because I want to make a Christmas event with our teams help! [size=18pt][u][b]Things We want to add:[/b][/u][/size] [u][b]Christmas event The second prayer book All boss's (corp etc.) 525 animations,models,interfaces Full screen Perfect economy; fully working summoning; fully working construction; (for donaters/members) fully working dungeenering(first ever); all quests from the real RS. all the minigames all the new bosses [/b][/u] We are aiming for about 200-500+ players! Sagi-evolution pictures. Just some features from his source! [img]http://s919.photobucket.com/albums/ad33/winnerzscape/tyt.png[/img] Barrage (sagi-evolution) [img]http://s919.photobucket.com/albums/ad33/winnerzscape/gyew67.png[/img] Ring of easter :D (sagi-evolution) [img]http://s919.photobucket.com/albums/ad33/winnerzscape/egg.png[/img] Custom gwd place killcount and stuff (sagi-evolution) [img]http://s919.photobucket.com/albums/ad33/winnerzscape/etjmqwt.png[/img] Bandos (inside) (sagi-evolution) [img]http://s919.photobucket.com/albums/ad33/winnerzscape/87-8-.png[/img] Some Commands (sagi-evolution) [img]http://s919.photobucket.com/albums/ad33/winnerzscape/commands.png[/img] Some weps (sagi-evolution) [img]http://s919.photobucket.com/albums/ad33/winnerzscape/11-19-20108-39-16AM.png[/img] Info:
I don't want people that fight all the time!I want mature people, that actually can work together. I also don't want people that will quit after a day or so.This is not something you can act silly in. If you would like to apply please apply in this format: [code] Name: Msn/email: Applying for: Proof: By stating "yes" you agree to the info provided above:[/code] Accepted apps: 1/1 Website designers [code]Name:Jason but call me Pluvia I like it better. Msn/email: pluvia1@live.com my email and MSN Applying for:Website designer Proof:This.. By stating "yes" you agree to the info provided above: yes..... More info: I do not have my computer back yet. I will have it soon. I will make you something pretty good website too. I want to do this because I like making web sites. Plus doing websites it does not restrict me to one team. I am the web designer of Perfection-X also.[/code] Server Coder 1/4 (please send me link of proof) [code]Name:Clay. Call Me Unholy Msn: osicknessx@hotmail.com Applying for: server Coder Proof: Released xightmarepkz. Able to Code 614, 317, and 562 Fairly Well. By stating "yes" you agree to the info provided above: Yes[/code]

item.dc:creator: @Sagi Sagi
item.description:
@Sagi wrote:

I saw you want to add second prayer book? Ah…so easy for that to be done on mine, bcoz you just need to add there effects, idk how. About the interface, do ::interface 22500 with owner rights. Its the code for the new prays interface.

item.title: Destarrest [pi]
item.dc:creator: @javamantle javamantle
item.description:
@javamantle wrote:

[quote=“Pluvia, post:11, topic:369756”][quote author=Pluvia link=topic=465881.msg3406733#msg3406733 date=1290375225]
1/2 website desingers?
How are 2 people soposed to really make a site? Honestly, if you want another person it will run smoother if only 1 people are working on it. Now if you a big site with somuch updated content like lets say MSN.com, You should use CSS as it allows people with little or none knowlage of coding to change content. For that, I could see why you would need more than one person but for a strait foward site for a RSPS then 1 Person is all you need. You can still update content but you won’t be like a MSN or Yahoo that is all about global news.
[/quote]
Yeah did you read this yet?[/quote]
Just read changed it

Read full topic

item.title: Destarrest [pi]
item.dc:creator: @Pluvia Pluvia
item.description:
@Pluvia wrote:

paymon:

what about our site?

Don’t worry I will still make your site lol =]

1/2 website desingers?
How are 2 people soposed to really make a site? Honestly, if you want another person it will run smoother if only 1 people are working on it. Now if you a big site with somuch updated content like lets say MSN.com, You should use CSS as it allows people with little or none knowlage of coding to change content. For that, I could see why you would need more than one person but for a strait foward site for a RSPS then 1 Person is all you need. You can still update content but you won’t be like a MSN or Yahoo that is all about global news.

Read full topic
